name: governs-ai
description: AI Governance OS - Secure control plane for AI interactions

scripts.clean: find . -name 'node_modules' -type d -exec rm -rf {} + 2>/dev/null || true && find . -name 'dist' -type d -exec rm -rf {} + 2>/dev/null || true && find . -name 'generated' -type d -exec rm -rf {} + 2>/dev/null || true && find . -name '.next' -type d -exec rm -rf {} + 2>/dev/null || true && find . -name '.turbo' -type d -exec rm -rf {} + 2>/dev/null || true && find . -name 'build' -type d -exec rm -rf {} + 2>/dev/null || true && find . -name 'out' -type d -exec rm -rf {} + 2>/dev/null || true && find . -name '.vercel' -type d -exec rm -rf {} + 2>/dev/null || true && find . -name 'coverage' -type d -exec rm -rf {} + 2>/dev/null || true && find . -name '*.tsbuildinfo' -type f -exec rm -f {} + 2>/dev/null || true
